question: As I read some pairs of phrases, please tell me which one best reflects your impression of Narendra Modi. Do you think Narendra Modi is ____? b. someone who is able to get things done OR someone who is not able to get things done
raw_output:
Narendra Modi is often perceived as a leader who has been able to implement significant reforms and policies efficiently. His supporters highlight his ability to get things done, while critics may see challenges or question his effectiveness. Based on the general impression and his reputation for decisive action, I believe he is best described as someone who is able to get things done.

ANSWER: A
